1.content:
It was Thursday, the day of your thirteenth birthday. It was a day you had both looked forward to and dreaded as it was the day you had to make the biggest decision of your life. For as long as you were able to understand the words, you were told that each third born child in your family was born genderless. Today you had to decide weather to start acting more feminine and become a girl or act more masculine and become a boy.

As you understood it, your frame of mind during your thirteenth year determined your gender. Until now, you had been acting somewhere in between to appease your older brother and sister who had been competing for a younger brother or sister for the past year. Now that you had to make a final decision, you knew that their rivalry over you was about to explode. "It's going to be a very long day." you sighed, sitting onto your bed.

Just then, a knock came to your bedroom door. You answered to find it was...
1.title: birthday *improved by Scifiwizard*

choices: you try to look happy eventrough you dont like it
11.content: its you sis "hey alex,happy bday and here is your gift" she gives you the gift as you see that it is make up.....
11.title: Your sis

choices: He pulled Teri out of the room.
111.content:
"Th... Thanks, sis." you said, tearing up. "It's great but..."

Teri's heart began to sink. "But what?" she asked, fearing Tim had already got to you.

You sighed. "I... I don't know how to put any of this on." you replied, honestly. "If I try to do it myself, I fear I'll make a mess of my face."

Teri released a breath and smiled. "I could teach you." she offered. "As you have not yet experienced anything truly feminine, you don't know the wonders of being a girl."

You allowed your head to fall. "I don't know if I'm a girl or a boy yet." you replied. "It's more frustrating than you can imagine."

"I know, Alex." said Teri, wincing. "I'm just trying to help."

"I appreciate that." you said with a half smile. "I'll give the life of a girl a try, just push anything on me, okay?" you sighed. "I'm feeling very weird, my body trying to decide if I am male or female. It feels like a war is raging inside of me and the odds are even."

Teri nodded. "I understand." she said. "We'll take this slow, one step at a time."

Just then, another knock came to your door and Tim entered, not seeing Teri at first. "Happy birthday, Alex!" he said, smiling. "I got you something..."

You opened the long package to find a baseball bat, glove, and ball. "Um.. Thanks, Tim, they're great." you said. "Only, I promised to spend some time with Teri already." you winced, not wanting to hurt anyone's feelings. "Sorry, maybe later today?"

Tim turned to find Teri who smiled innocently and gave him a ginger wave. "Ladies first." she whispered, smiling. "Don't worry, maybe she'll become a tomboy."

Tim sighed, frustrated, then...
111.title: you are happy but confused.

1113.content:
Tim sighed, frustrated, then left the room,mumbling.
As he is out of the room Teri begins her work on you, afew minutes later she is finished and you..
1113.title: He left, mumbling.

11132.content:
You looked at your reflection and began to tear up, looking frustrated. Teri saw this and lightly placed a hand onto your shoulder. "Is... Is something wrong?" she asked.

"I admit you did a good job." you said, looking closer at yourself. "Only, I... I..."

"You don't like it?" asked Teri, hurt.

"Something... is missing." you said. "I've never worn makeup before so... I can't put my finger on what it is."

Teri rose a hand to her chin, thinking. "You have a good eye if you can spot something wrong, having never worn makeup before." she said. "That's a good sign." That you may turn out to become my little sister.

You looked at your reflection again and began to play with your hair, not knowing why, and Teri smiled. "Of course, your hair is of a gender neutral style." she said, beaming. "That so does not go with your makeup."

"Is that it?" you asked, curious. "Is hair really that important?"

Teri giggled. "Alex, you have a lot to learn." she said. "Don't worry, though, your big sis is here for you."

With that said, she began to work on your hair while Tim impatiently waited for his turn to bond with you. "Try all you want, sis." he said to himself. "Alex is going to be a boy."

Minutes later, Teri had finished styling your hair and you looked at yourself again...
11132.title: Something is missing.

111321.content: You smile brightly and hugs your sis tighly "Thanks, sis" and you went to Tim to Talk with him.
111321.title: You like the new look.

1113211.content:
"It's so unfair, she always it goes her way!" he mumbled, tearfully. "First she decided that we should go to a theme park instead to a baseball game, just because she said so, and this on my B-day!" he sighed. "Well, the park was fun but still... and now she is forcing Alex ....!"

He stopped as you hugged him "Tim you are wrong, it's true that she gave me the makeup kit but I insisted that she helped. She isn't forcing me, its my own decision to try it out, and even if I become a girl I will still play baseball with you!"

Tim seemed to calm down. "Thanks Alex,.." you smile "..but how many time I must tell you that you must knock before you enter my room." said Tim jokingly. "

"Sorry, bro." with that you left the room and went towards your school...
1113211.title: Talk with Tim

11132111.content:
As soon you leaved your home you were met by your two best friends, Lisa and Greg. They are fraternal twins, you've known them both for as long as you can remember, they lived a few houses down the road.

Before you could even can say hi, Lisa began to chuckle and asked, even through she knew the answer. "Let me guess your sister was the first to give you your present?"

At first you didn't know how she knew but it didn't take long before it came to you that you were wearing makeup and had a rather girly hairstyle.

"Yeah, she was the first. She the gave me a makeup kit. She even helped me with it" you answered.

"I must say, I wouldn't have known you weren't a real girl" thought Greg. then he said, looking at me, "I would ask you out on a date."

You blushed as it was well known in the school that Greg was very popular among the girls but he had turned down each girl that confessed to him.

"Thanks Greg" you said, looking away. you did not want that him to see you blushing.

After a little chat and they said happy birthday to you, the three of you went towards the school...
11132111.title: continue

111321111.content:
As soon as my class mates saw you the hell broke lose...

All of them came to you, which was unfortunately nearly in center of the room, and bombarded you with questions and comments.

Kim a well built and energetic leader of the school cheerleader squad was the first to speak. "Hey Alex, you look good today. We're having cheer leading practice after school, want to join in, we have a spare uniform that should fit."

Tom the bulky base baller didn't take your style very well and half screamed, "No way, forget that girly stuff! Come to baseball practice, we need you!"

Karl the bully of the school said something like, "Cute hairstyle, when are you going to start playing with 'dollies'?"

"Leave her alone! " said a slender blond haired Lisa suddenly. she turned to you. "Being a girl is great, you'll see."

Lisa's outburst surprised many people as she was normally rather shy. But the silence didn't last long as your classmates then continued to shout out all kinds of questions and comments. You were nearly crying as a hand is grabbed your arm and took you towards the girls room. You looked up and saw...


Lisa
Someone else.
111321111.title: at the school

1113211111.content:
You looked up, saw Lisa, and began to cry.

"Let it out Alex..." she said, hugging you. "Just let it out."

It took a few minutes of crying for you to calm down before Lisa released you. "Feeling better Alex?" she asked with a worried expression.

You slowly nodded, saying, "Thank you. If you hadn't come I would have cried in front of the entire cla...." Lisa stopped you.

"Its okay for girls to cry." she said, gently.

"But I'm not a gir..." you stop as she took your hand and pulled you towards one of the mirror.

"Look in the Mirror and tell me what you see." said Lisa, smiling. "I see a cute 13 year old girl who was crying in the girls' room."

You looked at the mirror without saying a word. She was right, you looked like a normal 13 old girl and guessed that a person who didn't know you would see you as a girl.

"You are right." you said, your smiling face returning.

As you looked in the mirror again, you spotted something that you didn't like.

Blushing you turned to Lisa. "Could I borrow your make up?" you asked, barely above a whisper but she seemed to have heard it.
Smiling she opened her bag and took out her make up kit an began her work.
1113211111.title: Lisa

11132111111.content:
After school, you played baseball with Tim at home. Only, during the game, you noticed something was off, you did not take it well.

"Tim why aren’t you throwing the ball with more power" you asked annoyed.

"Ähem...well...äh.. because... you are.....and..." he stuttered, blushing.

You rolled your eyes. "Tim, just because I look like a girl and might become one, does it really make me a fragile doll?" you asked in a slightly angered tone.

"No, but..." he trailed off.

You know what he meant... you could understand him, hell you would do the same but still bothered you so you decided to play a little bit unfair.

"I'll give you choice, play serious or play like before and I'll tell mom about your "books" inside your old pc." you smiled, adding, "You know how mom feels about such things..."

You knew you didn't need to say more as he threw the ball as he always had. A few hours later you were done playing and you headed up to the bathroom but to you forgot to knock and found a stark naked Teri before you.

How does she reacted
11132111111.title: after school

choices: your body reacts like it's no big deal
your body  reacts like it is a big deal
111321111111.content:
She is in the bathtub and smiles towards you "want to join Alex?" she asked.

You blushed the bathtub would be great enough but still.... you turn around and begin to
open the door as Teri is leaving the bathtub and toke your hand. You looked at her naked
body and you blushed even more.

"Alex why won’t you take a bath with your sis" she says putting.

"Well you are a girl and i..." you trailed off, still blushing

And to the second time in the day someone is taking you to a mirror, but this time a full
length mirror. Standing right to you she ask "what are you seeing?" she asked slightly annoyed.

And like before you see a girl staring back at you, „A girl with her sister.." you say
nearly instantly.

Terri smiled. "I see a sibling who is trying to find his or her identity." she said. "Take a bath with me, let's see how your body reacts."

You turned to her, alarmed. "How my body... (gulp) reacts?" I asked.

Terri nodded. "If your body reacts like it's no big deal, it will be proof that you are becoming more of a girl." she said. "if it reacts like it is a big deal, it will prove you are leaning towards becoming a boy."

You blushed brightly, though you could see some logic in Terri's words. "How will I know how my body reacts?" I asked.

Terri sighed. "I'll know." she said. "Don't worry, the tub is big enough for both of us and I promise I'll keep my hands to myself."

You swallowed hard, uncertain if this was a good idea. "Okay, I guess."
111321111111.title: good

1113211111111.content:
Terri smiled and began to pull your shirt off, causing you to blush. "Woah, wait, sis." you said, surprised.

"What?" asked Terri with a giggle. "You can't take a bath with your clothes on, silly."

With a sigh, you nodded and Terri finished pulling your shirt off and smiled. You were tempted to ask why but you remained silent as Terri then unbuckled your pants and allowed them to drop as you stepped out of the. Within minutes, you were in the tub with your sister, the heavy suds covering everything below the water from view.

"How do you feel, Alex?" asked Terri.

You shrugged. "Okay, I guess." you said. "It's a bit awkward, being in the tub with you though."

"Do you feel strange at all?" asked Terri.

"Not really." you said, honestly. "My chest itches pretty bad but that's nothing big."

"It might be later, we'll see." thought Terri before saying, "Don't forget to wash behind your ears."

You grinned. "Yes, mother." you giggled, sending a splash her way.

"Oh, you want to play?" asked Terri, splashing you back.

You and Terri began to screech and giggle as you splashed each other in a short water fight before Terri motioned you to stop. "Remember how I would know if your body was or was not reacting?" she asked.

You nodded. "Yeah, what of it?"

Terri smiled. "You seem a lot more comfortable, being in the tub with me than before." she said. "If you were going all boy on us, you would have been in the mood to play and you started this game."

You were surprised by this and gave Terri a small smile. "I don't feel as anxious as I did before, because I wasn't thinking about it." you replied. "Could that be it?"

"Maybe." replied Terri. "We'll know better in the morning."

You tilted your head to the side. "What's going to happen in the morning?"

Terri grinned and replied...
1113211111111.title: your body reacts like it's no big deal

11132111111112.content:
"You'll see." was all she said before leaving for her room.

Even during dinner you wondered what would happen tomorrow, only you couldn't think of anything. All that seemed off was the itching in your chest. Hours later, as you were lying in bed, the itching was driving you crazy but the though of what might happen the next day weighed on your mind more.

"What could be?" you asked yourself, still scratching at your chest. "Man, I must have hit some poison oak or something.."

It was not until around 11PM when you finally fell asleep.
11132111111112.title: You'll see.

111321111111121.content:
It wasn’t until 10am that you woke up, lucky for you that today is a school free day
because your city is celebrating its forming around 300 years ago.

To your luck the itching mostly subsided but it was still there but not as bad as
yesterday.
Half a sleep you walked towards the bathroom.
As you walked towards the sink you risked a look in the full length mirror... you turned
fully to it to look again at you "What th..." you covered your mouth with one of
your hands as a slightly higher voice as usually came out of you.

After a few second you slapped your face as a voice came from you right.
"Have you finally realized what I meant yesterday?" you don’t even need to
look towards the voice to know that it is Terri.

"Yeah...." you were becoming a girl if your slightly risen chest , and higher
voice were any significance, hell even you hear was slightly longer then yesterday, you
even briefly looked inside your underwear to see you formally flat croin area had a hardly
noticeable gap.
"I am turning in a girl, aren’t I?" you asked knowing the answer already.

"Wow this took long, but will you tell it your friends now or wait until the changes
are more noticeable"

This was a rather difficult decision on the one hand the chances what it will come out if
you tell it to you friends is rather high and the boys would hit on you,....hell some of
them even already formed a fan club for the case I would become a girl with the reason
that you can only look cute because you were already cute without a gender.....
But on the other hand they would be angry at me when it became noticeable because you
didn’t tell them anything...
It was a damn dilemma...

After around 5 minutes you decided.

"I will....."
111321111111121.title: The next morning.

1113211111111212.content:
"I will not tell them, I know they will be angry later but I know they will understand me.... at least I hope so...“you said still a little unsure if you to the right thing.

"They will. After all, they are your friends." Teri said smiling.

"Thanks this helped a lot, sis." you said.

To tell the truth it doesn’t helped much... you know that they don’t like liars very much. The rest of you long weekend was quiet even the changing of your body seemed to make a small stop. It wasn’t until Monday morning that your plan to don’t tell anything about your changing was in great danger. Your first class was p.e, and if you remember right your teacher said that your class will play soccer in the next class.

You just hoped nothing will happen ….
1113211111111212.title: not tell them

choices: You are back to square one.
11132111111112121.content:
Only five minutes to go." you thought, looking towards the goal as you ran.

With the soccer ball ball in you possession, you were right in front of the goal. You were confident that you could get it passed Lisa and make the point, she wasn’t a very good goal keeper. Then again, but were you a good soccer player. You wanted to kick the ball but you froze up as a sharp pain came to life in you mid-section.

"Ow.... Ow!" you moaned, the pain increasing.

Seeing you buckle over, Lisa knew something was wrong and immediately ran to you, concerned. “Alex what wrong?” she asked.

“Nothing, I'm ….. I'm okay.” you replied, gasping for breath with each word.

Lisa was not impressed. “Come on, I can tell something is wrong.”

“It’s nothing I am okay.” you insisted with slightly longer breaths as the pain seemed to become stronger.

“Then why are you clutching you mid-section?” asked Lisa, more concerned.

You didn't realize that you doing it until now. but continued to insist that you were fine. Lisa, however, was not buying it as the other members of each team drew closer, wondering what was happening.

“Alex, this is not time to play 'tomboy', don't lie to me, tell me what is wrong!"

You barely heard a word she had said as the world around you vanished as you were swallowed into darkness...

When you eventually woke up, it was the next day. You found yourself in a hospital room, with someone holding you hand. You turned to find mom looking at you with concern on her face.

"Welcome back to the world of the living." she said, looking relieved. "We were scared, for a while, that you were not going to wake up."

"What happened?" you asked.

Mom sighed and replied...
11132111111112121.title: something happens

111321111111121212.content:
"You are back to square one." said mom, gently.

"What do you mean, square one?" you asked confused and frightened.

"Your body is back to the state it was on your 12 birthday…" replied mom, patiently. "This happens when your mind and body can not clearly decide which gender it truly wishes to be."

“How should I know which gender I really want, mom?” you said, after a pause, “It's not like I can switch back and for...”

You were interrupted by your mom “Actually you can to it, my dear."

With that, she took off a pendant she always worn and gave it to you.

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_AJ5M8RD84Xs/TB...)

“Um... mom why are you giving me this?" you asked, confused. "Didn't grandma , give it to you?” you asked confused.

“It’s yours as part of your... our condition." said mom, smiling. "It is given to the third born child at the proper moment, once the changes begin to become obvious.” she giggled. "It allowed me to become a true boy and girl to 'test drive' the gender, it will do the same for you as well, Alex."

“Cool, does this mean I can change forth and back anytime?”

“No, dear it comes with a few rules and side effects" replied mom, smiling. "First, the pendant will only hold you in one form for a week before returning you to... normal. Second, and I advise you to listen, wait at least 3 days between each change because the changing process places a heavy strain for your body. Change too quick and you'll end up in bed."

"Anything else?" you pressed.

Mom sighed. "You have to understand everything, don't you?” she asked.

"Always read the fine print." you countered. "Dad taught me that."

Mom nodded. "If you will feel certain urges during your week as a guy or girl, fell free to 'explore them' but don't go too far." she said, smiling. "If you make love to a boy, while a girl, you'll be stuck that way for life." she then sighed. "I learned that the hard way with your dad when it was my turn to decide."

Your mouth opened in shock as mom then stood up and walked to the door. "Everything has a price, Alex." she said, turning to you. "Don't let your friends play cupid."

“MOM” you said heavily blushing, your mom was just chuckled and left the room.
111321111111121212.title: You are back to square one.

1113211111111212121.content:
It wasn’t until 8 o clock that you were finally home.
After dinner, finally a good one, and a really relaxing shower, you were laying on you bed thinking about what you mother told you about the pendant.

You were considering which gender you should try first...
You know that you can later be the other gender but it is still an important matter for you.

It wasn’t until 10 pm that you made you decision but now you realized that you hadn’t asked how to do it, so you decide to ask mom tomorrow because you were so tired.

Unknown to you the pendant was glowing during you sleep.

The next morning you woke up as a...
1113211111111212121.title: Later (at home)

11132111111112121211.content:
"A girl." I said with a sigh, looking at myself in the full length mirror. "I became a girl."

Mom entered and smiled, seeing me looking at my feminine form in the mirror. "The pendant changes you into the gender you most desire to experience." she said, starling me. "Once you make your final decision, the pendant will lock you into that gender type, male or female." she paused, looking at me. "However, there is one thing I failed to mention."

"What's that?" I asked, wondering if I wanted to know.

"The pendant, in cases like yours, allows you to switch genders at will." replied mom with a smile. "Say you make the final decision to be a girl, you will be registered as one at school and on your personal ID card. Only, there will be a mark on each identification that states you are a 'switcher'."

I took a step back, confused and frightened. "A... A switcher?" I asked.

Mom nodded. "A person with the ability to switch genders." she replied. "Of course, you will be trained in how to control it but you will be asked to switch persona when say the school needs an extra player on the football team or a cheerleader calls off sick during a championship game."

"Don't I get any say in what gender I want to be?" I asked, slumping onto my bed.

"Of course you do, sweetie." said mom, sitting next to me. "If you choose to be a girl, that is who you will be and you can remain that way, not changing at all for the rest of your life." she smiled. "Just understand that the power to become a strong boy is within you."

I sighed, wanting to scream. "So I'm still a 'gender confused' teenager."

Mom giggled. "Only until you make your final decision." she said, hugging me. "As I said, who you become is up to you and I will leave it up to you weather or not to tell anyone you are a 'switcher'."

With that said, mom stood up and left me to ponder my fate...
11132111111112121211.title: girl

choices: on the way to the school

but one thing i knwo for sure it wouldnt be wise to dont take the school serious because no matter that i would became i need ao good education to became a good mother or father for my future children.

My body felt so sensetiv.

I hesitated to walk down.... I feared that my family, especially my brother, wouldnt like my new look.. I wanted to go back to bed and sleep through it all but that wasn't a option, I had school today.

Still in my own world, I hadn't noticed how sis walked in my room, saw me and left, returning with her make up. "You look great Alex,but something is missing."

1113211111111212121111.title: breakfast

11132111111112121211111.content:
"You know I'm always here for you, no matter what gender you decide to become." said Tim, smiling. "If any boy tries something with you, let me know and I'll pound him!"

I giggled slightly, letting out a sigh of relief. "I was afraid you wouldn't like my decision to be a girl." I said.

"Well, yeah, I would have liked to have a brother." admitted Tim. "Only the choice was always yours to make." he then smiled at me. "Teri and I agreed a long time ago that we'd support your decision, no matter what."

I teared up, knowing that my family was behind me a hundred percent the entire time. It was a comforting feeling, moving me to want to please them all and there was only one way... "My final decision is to be a girl." I said, looking at my family. "However, I have also decided to become a switcher so I can have have fun with both my sister and my brother." I then rose a finger of warning. "I only want my family and closest friends to know."

Tim smiled then turned to Teri, who smiled as well. "A girl is your root form, right?" she asked.

I nodded. "I am Alexandria Marison." I replied. "I will only switch to play with my brother and his friends or to defend myself from certain dangers."

Dad, hearing this, rose from his seat. "You are both staying home from school today." he said. "We need to celebrate this occasion and set up her identity as a female switcher."

"What do we start with?" I asked.

Mom smiled and replied...

She then turned to Teri and Tim "Afterwards, you can go to the local mall with Alex and shop for clothes that are suited for her new assets." she paused "And after that is done we can have a party" she said.

"Uh I don't like shopping with girls but if it is for my cute litle sis i thing i can make a exception" Tim said teasingly at which you blushed.

"Thank you" you said slightly tearing up.
111321111111121212111112.title: Legal matters first.

You and your mother went to Karl, a muscular man in his end 30, he worked in some kind of

You mother knocked at the door,it doesn't took long until Julia ,his 13 old daughter

She was a rather girlie girl, always wearing skirts and such things, she has pig tailed

Your Mother accepted the other and so you both went in.
1113211111111212121111121.title: Family Friend

1113212.content:
Your hair is still done up in a girly style. For years now, you have been wearing boy's pajamas to bed, except in a more pastel color that could make them seen as Girls' Department if you stretch your mind a little. But nobody said anything about your having to commit to being a girl. As you embrace the retreating Tim from behind, you try and use as much of your gentle strength as you can, to show him that you still can be male.

He smiles down at you.

"Tim, listen. I know I've been doing a lot of girl stuff with Teri lately, but I still have lots of time left before I become one sex or the other. There's still plenty of time for me to do some guy stuff with you. I'm still undecided, so we'll just have to make it up as we go. How about this: I'll be a girl today and a guy tomorrow?"

"Eh, do what you want. Just chalk all that back there up to jealousy or somethin'. And whatever you decide, you'll always be my little bro."

You smile as he tousles your hair. From your bedroom, Teri calls out for you to come and get dressed. You lose a mite bit of your cheery demeanor when she mentions a training bra. But you eventually come out of your room dressed as a girl and ready for breakfast.
1113212.title: Reassurance

11132121.content:
While the Breakfast was farily uneventful after the little talk out from earlier. One Issue remained through. One Issue you hadn't thought about until now.
How will your classmates react to you new look?

Sure they all know of my rather unique situation, so they shouldnt be suprised. On the other hand so far they saw me more as an guy then a girl. I even used the boys bathroom and locker so far.

As if reading my mind my mother said "Dont worry sweety, they will accept the curennt you. I am sure of it. Afterall its not the body that makes you you but your character and that wont change."

"Thanks mom.", while her words calmed me down i still had to question her words. Afterall even you very brother had a small breakdown about it and he is a family member.

If he reacts like this... I dont want to think about it. Mom i hope you are right.

Soon afterwards we left for school.
11132121.title: Continue

choices: It's a gift card to the mall.
12.content:
Your bro,Tim, was quite the hunk. He was the star of the local baseball Team and had a many fangirls and even a few fanboys. But this wasn't important now because you know that he will try to guide you towards the male gender.

"Hey Alex ,you know what day it is, don't you?" he asked.

You nodded

"Well then Happy Birthday!" he said while giving you a slap on you shoulder. "Here is your present, I hope you like it. There is more from me and everyone else downstairs, see you in a few." with this he left.

And as you predicted it was a rather boyish present... A baseball glove. Looking out your door, you saw your sister pouting slightly. Somehow, you knew she was hoping to get to you first.

A little bit later you came in the dinning room to see you whole family waiting for you. Seeing your sister still pouting, you accepted a gift from her next....
12.title: your bro

13.content:
You found your Mom entering the room in her usual attire, strict but, at the same time, it looked like something you would wear in you free time... if this even makes sense. To tell the truth you were happy that it wasn't your sis or bro, you know that they would try to guide towards one gender or the other.

"Alex you know what day it is, don't you?" she asked.

You nodded.

"This is the day I am pleased to say Happy Birthday." she said, hugging you. "Also, because of the significance of this birthday, I am pleased to give you this Medallion" she took off the medallion had always worn and gave it to you.

"Thanks mom" you said as you put it on.

"It looks good on you,but I must tell you something about that medallion." said mom. she took a breath. "This medallion is far from normal, it was given to our family because of our condition. It will allow children like you to try out both genders with all advantages and drawbacks." pausing, she added, "But the affect wears of after 4 Weeks and it will need a refresh time of 3 days. I suggest you allow at least 5 days to transform again because its rather straining to the body."

"Thanks mom, but how to I change? And is it painful?" you asked curious and afraid at the same time.

"Well it is a awkward feeling but by no means painful, and after a few time you wont mind it anymore. As to how to change, it rather simple just concentrate on the gender you want to try out." she said as she left "ah and before i forgot from now on a special mark will be in you school ID and by all means tell no one outside of the Family that you are a "switcher" with this she left the room.

A little bit later you came in the dinner room as a...
13.title: your mom

131.content: You came out of your room and into the dining room as a girl. You wore a green shirt and grey hoodie with a pair of grey sweatpants. You wore the medallion your mom gave you around your neck. The medallion had changed its appearance, having grey flowers and a greenish-blue gem in near the top. You sat down at the dinner table and everyone casually talked, not wanting to make things feel awkward. After dinner, everyone went off and did their own things, either watching t.v. in the living room or going to the rooms to do other stuff. Once you put your dishes in the dish washer, you went into the hallway you and your sister and brother shared. You walked down the hallway and went into...
131.title: girl

1312.content:
You walked down to Teri's room and knocked on the door. She came and opened the door."
"Hey Alex. What's up?"
"Mind if I come in?"
Teri nodded and you headed into her room, sitting at the edge of her bed. She walked by you and sat at her computer chair, a school assignment half complete.
"What's going on Alex. Is something the matter?"
"No, I'm fine. I just wanted to ask if you could help me fix this hair of mine. This pendent didn't exactly change much of it."
"I know what you mean, that messy hair of yours doesn't fit you what so ever. Lets get it all fixed up."
"Yeah..." You felt a bit taken about by what she said, still undecided of what you really fit as.
The two of you walked over to her makeup table and she took out her brush, straightening you hair out. You looked in the mirror and saw your long brown hair going down your back.
"Wow, you really did an awesome job. Thanks a lot."
"No prob. If there's anything else I can help you with just come to me."
"Thanks."
With that, you left her room and headed out to the living room. There, you found your mom and dad watching a movie. You asked them if you could go walk to the park. Oh course, they obliged, so you went out the front door and started walking down to the park. As you walked, you felt a bit lighter than you usually did, causing you to bounce off the ground. You also felt your your chest bouncing a bit more, due to your breasts. While you did have them before, they weren't as developed as they were now, being an A-cup. Once you got to the park, you walked around a bit, getting used to your new body. As you walked, you noticed someone you thought you recognized from school. Your thoughts were confirmed as they came closer. It was...
1312.title: Teri's Bedroom

13123.content: It was Kyle and Rebecca, your best friends since the first grade. Suddenly, the words of your mom came back to you; "Don't tell anyone your a switcher." You knew they would recognize you for sure if you didn't do something, so you quickly turned on your foot and started moving into a group of trees. You started running, trying to gain as much gourd as possible. Suddenly, you fell down and went face first into the ground. You knew you were screwed if you didn't try to hide. you got to your hands and knees and worked your way behind a tree. Coming from where you were just walking, you hear the two calling. You push your back to the trunk of the tree, terrified of what was going to happen. You heard them getting closer, calling out for an answer. You did your best to slow your breathing, trying to be as quiet as possible. After a few minutes...
13123.title: Kyle and Rebecca

choices: Blurt out something you don't want to
131231.content:
You look around to one side of the tree to see if they had left. You don't see anyone and you can't hear their calls anymore. You bring your head back and let out a sigh, thinking they left. Suddenly, someone puts their hand on your shoulder.
"Hey, you alright? You ran off like you saw a monster."
"Yeah, I'm...fine." You tried to disguise your voice as much as possible, still thinking they may not recognize you. Sadly, it wasn't good enough
"Hey, do we know you from somewhere?"
You freeze up, not knowing what to do. You go with your first instinct, and...
131231.title: They Find You

1312312.content:
Your thoughts are all over the place and you don't know what to do. Suddenly you screamed
"Back off you guys!!!" You put your hands over your mouth, realizing what you just said.
"Wait, Alex, is that you?" It was no use dening it, your cover was blown.
"Yes..."
"Why did you run? Is something the matter?"
1312312.title: Blurt out something you don't want to

13123121.content:
"Look, I really don't want to talk about it. I can't..."
"Alex, we're here for you. You don't need to hide anything from us."
"No, you guys are going to hate me if I tell you."
"Alex, you know us; we would never think anything less of you. Now, please tell us." You look up at your two friends, tears starting to form around your eyes. You wipe away the tears.
"My family is a special...for every third child, their gender is...undecided. Between their 13th and 14th birthday, they must...choose their gender. This pendent here...allows me to try both genders...for a limited amount of time. I...I..." You burst out in a stream of tears. It was all over. You pull yourself into a tight ball, head in your knees. You just waited for your two former friends to start insulting you and making fun of you. You couldn't take it anymore. Then you felt them come closer to you.
13123121.title: Tell them the truth

131231211.content:
Suddenly, you feel them sit down and lean against you, wrapping their hands around you.
"Oh Alex. It's ok. We understand."
"But I'm a freak. A genderconfused freak." You burst out crying even more. You feel Rebecca come around and sit in front you of.
"Alex, look at me." You pull yourself in tighter, but then you relax and bring yourself out. You look at her, tears still flowing down your face. "Alex, we're your best friends. We have known each other for most of our lives. Do you really think something like this would change everything just like that?"
"Yeah Alex. That's what makes you special. Heck, me and Rebecca are special in our own ways. I'm the top player on the football team and Rebecca is one of the smartest girls in the school."
"Alex, we're not like the other kids. We don't care what you are; your still our friend all the same."
"Really..."
"Oh course."
"Than...thanks you guys." You rubbed away the tears in your eyes. Rebecca and Kyle came right up to you and hugged you. You gave them a hug hug too. The three of you then got up and headed back to the path. The three of you discussed quietly about your whole situation. While it was somewhat strange, it was actually pretty interesting to the two. The three of you walked out of the park and start heading back towards all of your houses. Finally your reach your house. Outside, your parents are waiting for you.
"Hey Alex, how was your walk?"
"It was good. I even found Rebecca and Kyle there."
"That's nice. Is there anything you want to tell us?"
"What..."
"Alex, we know you told them."
"Look, we kind of forced hi...her to tell us. We won't tell anyone, promise." You were scared of what your parents were going to do. Your mom was very strict and she didn't put up with anyone breaking the rules. Finally, she made her verdict.
131231211.title: Continue

1312312111.content:
"Ok, I'll let this one slide Alex, but only because I know I can trust these two. If you dare to tell anyone else, you are going to be in huge trouble. Now, I think it's time for everyone to head back home."
"Ok, thank you very much."
With that, Kyle and Rebecca walked off, leaving you and your parents. You headed into your house and immediately your mom started talking to you about not telling people about your condition, much to your boredom. After about ten minutes, she finally let you go and you headed to your room. In your room, you took off your shirt and kicked off your shoes. Being a female now, you were every sensitive to the temperature of your room, which usually was warm for you. Now, it felt like a stove. You hopped onto your bed and turned on the t.v., going through the channels. As you tried to watch the t.v., your hair kept getting in your face, much to your annoyance. Finally, after an hour of continued hair pushing, you finally turned off the t.v.. Suddenly, you heard the A.C. kick on and shivers went right up your body. You quickly got under the covers and tried to warm up. You decided to try to get some sleep. Much to your dismay, it wasn't going to be that easy. Your body continuously went from hot to cold and back again. Finally, you find a fan and plug it in, putting it as high as possible. Almost immediately, the room becomes very cold. You hop under the covers and start to warm up. The fan helps a bit, stabilizing the temperature. Finally, your able to fall asleep.
1312312111.title: She Is Fine With it

choices: Only one of them show up
13123121111.content: The next morning you wake up and get dressed. You then head into the kitchen and eat breakfast with everyone. Once everyone finishes their breakfast, everyone except Dad gets in the car and go to school. Your mom heads to the office while Teri and Tim head off to their classes. You walk down the hallway and head into your first class: math. Despite all of your worries, it went very well. No one had really bothered you about your change. The rest of the day went on just like math, much to your relief. At the end of the school day, you went to your locker and picked up your stuff. You then went outside and waited for Kyle and Rebecca to join you as they usually did. After about ten minutes,
13123121111.title: The next morning

131231211112.content: Coming from the school, you only see one of them. It was...
131231211112.title: Only one of them show up

choices: It would be an awesome idea
1312312111122.content:
Walking up to you was Rebecca, who always showed up no matter what.
"Hey Rebecca. How you doing?"
"Just fine. Hey, Kyle won't be showing up today, he has a football game today."
"Josh darn it, I forgot about that. Now what are we going to do? I wanted to go play football in the park with you guys."
"Well I could help you with...you know."
"You know what, yeah. I could really use the help."
With that, you and Rebecca walk to her house and head to her room. She tosses her backpack next to her desk and heads over to her bed, sitting down with her legs crossed.
"Now, if your going to be a girl, you need to act the part. Now, walk."
"Ok..." You take your backpack off and did as she said.
"See, now here's the problem: your walking too much with your upper body. You need to walk with your hips. Watch me." She got up and showed how she walked. "Now, try again."
"Ok, your the expert."
You try multiple times to walk as she showed you, Rebecca constantly critiquing your every move. After about an hour of walking back and forth, you finally got it somewhat down. Over the next two hours, Rebecca taught you many other things about being a female, including your posture and manners. Surprisingly, you picked up all of it quickly. After all of the lessons, you were super exhausted, so Rebecca decided it would be a good to stop there and work on some school work. You and Rebecca sat at her desk and worked on some homework. After many hours, both of you finished your work you look outside and notice it is dark out. Suddenly, a text comes in on your phone' it's your mom asking where you are. You text her back saying your at Rebecca's house. As you wait for your mom to call back, Rebecca has an idea.
"Hey, why don't you ask if you can stay overnight? It would be totally fun."
"Yeah, lets see."
You text your mom again asking if you can stay overnight with Rebecca since it wasn't a school night. After a few minutes she texts back saying...
1312312111122.title: Rebecca

13123121111221.content:
You look at her text, showing it to Rebecca.
"Yes!!!" The both of you squeal in excitement.
"Now, how about we have a bit of fun."
You and Rebecca jumped on her bed and watched some different shows she liked. After about three hours of nonstop watching, Rebecca turned off the t.v..
"Now Alex, I think it's about time we continue with your work."
"My work? I thought you taught me mostly everything."
"Yes, but your fashion sense is still all wrong. First off, those clothes don't show off any of your assets. If anything, they conceal your figure. There's also the fact that your not wearing a bra or panties. You don't want to hurt your chest or lower regions because your not wearing the proper clothing."
"Ok ok, I get it. So what do you think I should wear?"
"Well..."
"Oh no." Rebecca got up from the bed and ran over to her wardrobe and closet. After a minute, she threw down some clothes on the bed.
"Now go try these on. I won't watch, promise."
"Ok..."
You really felt uncomfortable changing in front of your best friend, but you trusted her. She went on her bed and put her head under the covers. Quickly, you took your clothes off and put on the bra and panties she put on top. You looked over at her to make sure she wasn't looking. Of course, she wasn't. You proceeded to put on the rest of the clothing.
"Ok, I'm done." She pulled her head out of the covers and sat up, looking at you. You were wearing a pair of ripped jeans and a black tank top. Compared to your old clothes, these clothes clung to your body more, showing all of your curves. You also felt a bit more comfortable wearing the bra, your chest less irritated by the clothing. Rebecca sat there, staring at you.
"Wow, you look...Amazing."
"Well you did pick out some nice clothes."
"Thank you. Now what to do?"
13123121111221.title: It would be an awesome idea

131231211112211.content:
"Well I thing it's time we go to bed. Today's been too long of a day."
"Yeah, your probably right.you can sleep with me. I don't mind."
"Ok, if your ok with it."
You and Rebecca got into bed went into sleep. Honestly, you really liked sleeping with her. If felt so natural.
The next morning, you woke up and found Rebecca standing by her closet, changing. Your eyes widen and your gasp slightly at the sight of her in only her bra and panties. She looks over and see you're awake.
"Oh morning. Sorry about this. I didn't think you would be awake." Your face turned to a bright shade of red.
"It's...ok. This isn't weird, is it...?"
"No, not really. I mean, we are the same gender now. It's not weird for you, is it?"
"Not really. Just got to get used to it is all."
"It's ok. I get it. Now, how about we meet up with Kyle, he said he wanted to go do something this morning."
"Sweet. Can't wait."
You texted home real quick and Rebecca helped you get ready, helping you with your hair. You and Rebecca packed some things and headed to the...
131231211112211.title: Go to bed

1312312111122111.content:
After a bit of walking, you and Rebecca arrived at the pool. When you arrived there, you found Kyle waiting for you two.
"Bout time you two showed up. Now let's go get changed and head into the pool."
You and Rebecca nodded and everyone headed to the changing rooms. You followed Rebecca into the changing room and you both changed into swimsuits. Rebecca wore a two-piece swimsuit while you wore a one-piece she had lent you. You andRebecca headed out into the pool area and jumped in, Kyle no where in sight. You and Rebecca started swimming around a bit, waiting for Kyle to show up. You took this bit of time to get used to swimming with your new body. You found it much easier to swim due to your smaller and smoother body. After about 5 minutes, Kyle finally showed up. He jumped into the pool and splashed water all over you and Rebecca.
"Hey, you messed up our hair!"
"Oh Rebecca, it's only a bit of water."
"It's now funny, I spent so much time on it."
"Whatever. Now, how about we play some games."
"Sure, like what?"
1312312111122111.title: Pool

choices: Two or more of your Friends
15.content: So it's not a singular person from your family. Perhaps its two of them, like your brother and sister or your mother and father. Maybe it's even one or more of your friends. Or maybe your just hearing things?
15.title: Who could it be?

151.content:
While you were lost in thought, a knocking at your door brought you back to reality. Stuttering, you tell whoever it was to come in. To your shock, it was Tim and Teri.

"Hey Alex" Tim started, his voice a bit shaky. "So me and Teri have been talking and..." he stopped. You looked as he tried to get his words and wondered what he was about to say.

Just as you were about to ask though, Teri chimed in. "We've decided to put this rivalry between us to an end. No matter who you choose to be, we're both going here to support you, no matter what. This is your decision to make, not ours" she said. She looked over to Tim. "Tim, you have the box right?"

He gave a simple nod and revealed a small black box from behind him. He handed it to you, and both looked at you as you peered at it curiously. "Mom and dad gave this to us to give to you" Tim said. You wondered for a moment before opening the box, revealing a plain looking pendent. You picked up the pendent and examined it closely. Surely this is some kind of joke, right? you thought to yourself.

Teri spoke again. "I know this pendent looks a bit...plain, but from what mom and dad have told us, it is quite special. As you know, every third child in our family goes through the same thing as you are now, having to choose a gender between your 13th and 14th birthday. For generations, this pendent has been given to these children on their 13th birthday, the last one being mom herself. She-

You quickly interrupted. "Wait wait wait. So you're telling me...mom was just like me?"

They both nodded, this time Tim explaining. "Yeah, surprising isn't it. This pendent was actually the same one she wears all the time. From what she told us, when you wear this pendent, it will allow you to experience whichever gender you want for four weeks, changing your body accordingly. After those four weeks, it will need to recharge for about five days. One year from now, on your 14th birthday, you will have to make the final decision, the pendent fully changing your body to whichever gender you choose. Does...that make sense?

You looked at the both of them, trying to fully understand everything they just told you. So I can try both... You nodded to them, their faces lighting up with relief. "Thank you guys. Can I just...get some time to myself... to think all this over? I'll be down in a bit, ok?"

"Of course. We'll be downstairs waiting" they replied, waving off and heading downstairs, leaving you to ponder.

After taking your time to take all of this in, you looked to the box again and slowly pull out the pendent and wrap it around your neck. You thought for a few moments, taking your time to decide what gender to start with. You soon made your decision and thought of hard, wanting to be....
151.title: An Unexpected Turn of Events

info.brief_description: you a nearly normal 13 years old teenager,but only nearly you are neither a boy nor a girl

your a nearly normal 13 years old teenager,but only nearly you are neither a boy nor a girl you are genderless. It lies in your family,each third born kid in the family is genderless. Their repruductions organs will be created by there actions between thei 13 and 14 liveyear,if there action are mostly girl like they will become the ones of a girl and vice versa.

You are alex Marison and you are 13 years old
Teri your 14 year old sister,she is a cheerfull girl
Tim your 16 year old brother he is a baseballer
your mother is 36 year old and she is the Bio teacher of you school.
your father is 37 he is head doctor at the local hospital
